channel.title: ::loadbackup?
channel.description: Right sometimes people get reset on my server and I have to open backup files and look for there name and then go into char files and paste the char back up in it and save it.So I just want to make it so they can type ::loadbackup and get there file back someone give me command plz :D

item.title: ::loadbackup?
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

I got 100 errors if anyone else has the ::loadbackup command so that when I player gets reset it will load there backup file in backup folder.

Read full topic

item.title: ::loadbackup?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

if (command.startsWith("loadbackup")) { String player1 = command.substring(11); boolean foundPlayer = false; for (int i = 0; i < playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { if (playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equals(player1)) { foundPlayer = true; if (playerHandler.players[i].loadGame(backupPath)) System.out.println("Loaded succesfully"); //possibly change if (playerHandler.players[i].saveGame()) System.out.println("Saved successfully"); //possibly change } } if (foundPlayer) sendMessage("Player Found, and backup loaded"); else sendMessage("Player not found"); }

The ones with “possibly change” in comments, you may need to change, as I cannot remember the save and load methods.

Read full topic
